description: Ninja now weighs in at 109 lbs, which is the Featherweight division. She started her career weighing in at 117 lbs. Xana is bigger: over 25 lbs heavier than the little Ninja but we all know Ninja has hella skills. There's something about a little girl kicking the hell out of a bigger girl then fucking the shit out of her for losing.
title: Ninja (4-0) vs. Xana (1-2)
